contentrichtext.text: '''John Owen''' may refer to: ==Sports== *[[John Robert Blayney Owen]] (1849–1921), footballer and educator *[[John Owen (cricketer)]] (born 1971), former English cricketer ==Religious figures== *[[John Owen (bishop)]] (1854–1926), Bishop of St David's, Principal of St David's College, Lampeter *[[John Owen (bishop of St Asaph)]] (1580–1651), English bishop of St Asaph *[[John Owen (chess player)]] (1827–1901), English vicar and amateur chess player *[[John Owen (theologian)]] (1616–1683), English Nonconformist church leader and theologian *[[John Owen (chancellor of Bangor)]] (1698–1755), Welsh priest and opponent of Methodism *[[John Owen (priest)]] (1754-1824), Archdeacon of Richmond and Chaplain General of the British Armed Forces ==Politicians== *[[John Owen (MP for Oxford University)]], see [[Oxford University (UK Parliament constituency)]] *[[John Owen (MP for Caernarvon Boroughs)]], see [[Caernarvon Boroughs (UK Parliament constituency)]] *[[John Lewis Owen]], MP for [[Merioneth (UK Parliament constituency)]] *[[John Owen (died 1754)]], Welsh politician, represented Anglesey and Beaumaris in Parliament *[[Sir John Owen, 1st Baronet]] (1776–1861), Member of Parliament for Pembroke, 1841–1861 *[[John Owen (North Carolina politician)]] (1787–1841), Democratic governor of North Carolina from 1828 to 1830 ==Others== *[[John Owen (epigrammatist)]] (c. 1564–1622), Welsh epigrammatist *[[John Owen (Royalist)]] (1600–1666), Welsh Royalist officer during the English Civil War <!--*[[John Owen (pioneer)]] (1817–1889), pioneer of the American Northwest--> *[[John Owen (Owain Alaw)]] (1821–1883), Welsh musician and composer *[[John Dyfnallt Owen]] (1873–1956), poet and Archdruid <!--*[[Sir John Owen, 4th Baronet]] (1892–1973)--> *[[John Owen (author)]] (1952–2001), dramatist and director == See also == *[[Johnny Owen]] (1956–1980), boxer *[[John Owen-Jones]] (born 1971), Welsh theatre actor *[[Jon Owen]], American luger *[[Jon Owen Jones]] (born 1954), Welsh politician *[[Jonny Owen]] (born 1971), Welsh actor *[[Jack Owen (disambiguation)]] *[[John Owens (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Owen, John}}
